badge_description: Earned by those who have distinguished themselves by completing 5 Carpenter quests
Earned by those who have distinguished themselves by completing 5 Contractor quests
Earned by those who have distinguished themselves by completing 5 Plumber quests
Earned by those who have distinguished themselves by completing 5 Landscaper quests
Earned after completing 10 quests of any type
Earned by those who have distinguished themselves by completing their first quest
